content:
USER: [{'tool_use_id': 'toolu_01AE68o4FMF11voJqQeUrAEK', 'type': 'tool_result', 'content': '#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -euo pipefail

# Install standardized scripty on this machine

PREFIX=/opt/scripty
SERVICE_PATH=/etc/systemd/system/scripty.service

echo "[install] Creating ${PREFIX}"
sudo mkdir -p "$PREFIX"
sudo mkdir -p /var/log/scripty
sudo cp "$(dirname "$0")/scripty_agent.py" "$PREFIX/"
sudo cp "$(dirname "$0")/scripty_env.example" "$PREFIX/.env"

if command -v python3 >/dev/null 2>&1; then
  PY=python3
else
  echo "python3 not found" >&2
  exit 1
fi

echo "[install] Creating venv"
sudo "$PY" -m venv "$PREFIX/venv"
sudo "$PREFIX/venv/bin/pip" install --upgrade pip
sudo "$PREFIX/venv/bin/pip" install requests psycopg2-binary watchdog

echo "[install] Installing systemd service"
sudo cp "$(dirname "$0")/scripty.service" "$SERVICE_PATH"
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable scripty.service
echo "[install] Edit $PREFIX/.env then: sudo systemctl start scripty.service"', 'is_error': False}]
